description: This file contains unit tests for the FastAPI application’s user-related API endpoints, using TestClient to simulate HTTP requests and overriding dependencies with fake services for testing scenarios such as listing users with pagination, creating a user, and handling user not found error.

classes.name: _FakeUsersService
classes.description: A mock service class used in tests to simulate user service interactions, with methods for listing users, creating users, and handling user retrieval.

methods.name: test_users_list_ok_with_pagination
methods.description: Tests retrieving a paginated list of users with expected structure and content.

methods.name: test_users_create_returns_201
methods.description: Tests creating a new user and verifies response contains user details.

methods.name: test_users_get_not_found
methods.description: Tests the scenario where a user is not found, expecting a 404 error.
